name: Stacklands
summary: Stacklands is a village builder where you stack cards to collect food, build structures, and fight creatures. ? For example, dragging a Villager card on top of a Berry Bush card will spawn Berry cards which the villagers can eat to survive. ? Play your cards right and expand your village!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SIM (village builder)
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2022-04-08
  • 官方网站: https://sokpop.co
  • 开发: Sokpop Collective
  • 发行: Sokpop Collective
